lead_paragraph: The Southeastern Conference West quarterbacks Dak Prescott, Jake Coker and Brandon Allen all led scoring drives to help lead the South to a 27-16 win over the North in the Senior Bowl in Mobile, Ala. Allen, of Arkansas, passed for a game-high 106 yards.
snippet: The Southeastern Conference West quarterbacks Dak Prescott, Jake Coker and Brandon Allen all led scoring drives to help lead the South to a 27-16 win over the North in the Senior Bowl in Mobile, Ala. Allen, of Arkansas, passed for a game-high 106 yards.
abstract: South defeats North, 27-16, in college football's Senior Bowl.
